## Subset para aula e pesquisa
```{r}

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

dic_subset <- read_excel("dic.xlsx", sheet = "dic1")
base_iels1 <- base_iels %>% select(all_of(dic_subset$variable))

saveRDS(base_iels1, file = "base_iels1.RDS")

```
